name: Murky Water
description:
Murky Water is a Horror RPG which is made in RPG Maker MV.

This is the first RPG game I've made during a game jam, and my goal was to create all the content myself, which I ALMOST had time with. If I have time in the future I will try to continue with the game.

Note: This game is a demo, so it's not a complete game

Controls: Arrows to walk,  Space or Enter to confirm, Esc or Ins for menu, Esc for cancel. It's also possible to use the mouse.

Credits:

Most of the graphics are made by me but I had to use some placeholder graphics from RPG Maker MV.
Music and Sound effects are made by me. 

Font in Menu is taken from 1001fonts.com "Dark and black"

Photos taken from Unsplashed, by Jessica Fadel and JD Chow.

Plugins:

RingMenu by Fliktor
Fogandoverlay by Victor 
ScaleSprites by Yanfly
